document.full_text: north dakota and minnesota residents braced on friday as the red river edged toward a near-record crest in the fargo-moorhead area, with rain showers expected as the river peaks over the weekend.
document.title: north dakota, minnesota brace for red river crest
lines_and_colors: north dakota and minnesota residents braced on friday as the red river edged toward a near-record crest in the fargo-moorhead area, with rain showers expected as the river peaks over the weekend.
